name: Wallsey
description:
A game that involves kicking the ball towards the wall, bouncing it of and taking it in turn to kick it. If the ball stops, it is not your turn or you miss then your out.

///////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////

THIS IS A VERY EARLY ACCESS TITLE.

I will try to continue developing this game if I have support from the community but I am preparing for exams at the same time so development will be quite slow.

buy this game for what it is at the moment because development may stop all of a sudden.
